      • getActivities

        public List<TaggableActivity> getActivities(String context,
                                   TaggingProvider provider)
        Description copied from interface: TaggingManager
        Method to get a list of all taggable activities within the given context.
        Specified by:
        getActivities in interface TaggingManager
        Parameters:
        context - The context to search.
        provider - The provider that is getting the activities. This allows the producers to selectively return different lists of activities depending on the given provider.
        Returns:
        A list, possibly empty, of all taggable activities within the given context that are accessible by the given tagging provider.

      • getActivity

        public TaggableActivity getActivity(String activityRef,
                           TaggingProvider provider)
        Description copied from interface: TaggingManager
        Method to get a taggable activity by reference string.
        Specified by:
        getActivity in interface TaggingManager
        Parameters:
        activityRef - A reference for the taggable activity.
        provider - The provider that is getting the activity. This allows the producer to selectively return an activity, or none at all, depending on the given provider.
        Returns:
        The taggable activity, or null if no such activity exists or the provider cannot access it.

      • getItem

        public TaggableItem getItem(String itemRef,
                   TaggingProvider provider,
                   boolean getMyItemOnly,
                   String taggedItem)
        Description copied from interface: TaggingManager
        Method to get a taggable item by reference string.
        Specified by:
        getItem in interface TaggingManager
        Parameters:
        itemRef - The reference for the taggable item.
        provider - The provider that is getting the item. This allows the producer to selectively return an item, or none at all, depending on the given provider.
        taggedItem - Reference to an item that can be used for additional permission lookups
        Returns:
        The taggable item, or null if no such item exists or the provider cannot access it.

      • getItems

        public List<TaggableItem> getItems(String activityRef,
                          TaggingProvider provider,
                          boolean getMyItemsOnly,
                          String taggedItem)
        Description copied from interface: TaggingManager
        Method to get a list of taggable items for the activity identified by the given activity reference.
        Specified by:
        getItems in interface TaggingManager
        Parameters:
        activityRef - The reference for the taggable activity.
        provider - The provider that is getting the items. This allows the producers to selectively return different lists of items for the referenced activity depending on the given provider.
        getMyItemsOnly - This flag will return only items where the owner matches userId
        taggedItem - Reference to an item that can be used for additional permission lookups
        Returns:
        A list, possibly empty, of taggable items.

      • addLink

        public Link addLink(String activityRef,
           String tagCriteriaRef,
           String rationale,
           String rubric,
           boolean visible)
             throws PermissionException
        Method to add a new link. A RuntimeException will be thrown if the goal set of the given goal is not published (see GoalSet#isPublished()). This method calls #addLink(String, Goal, String, String, boolean, boolean) with locked set to false.
        Specified by:
        addLink in interface TaggingManager
        Parameters:
        activityRef - A reference for the activity to which this link is being created.
        tagCriteriaRef - The tagCriteriaRef to which this link is being created. It must belong to a published parent.
        rationale - The rationale for creating this link.
        rubric - Some rubric value.
        visible - True if this link should be made visible to those with appropriate permissions, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        The link that has been added, or null on error.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - Exception thrown if current user doesn't have permission to perform this action.

      • addLink

        public Link addLink(String activityRef,
           String tagCriteriaRef,
           String rationale,
           String rubric,
           boolean visible,
           boolean locked)
             throws PermissionException
        Method to add a new link. A RuntimeException will be thrown if the goal set of the given goal is not published (see GoalSet#isPublished()). TaggingManager.SECURE_MODIFY_LINKS_FROM is checked in the activity context and TaggingManager.SECURE_MODIFY_LINKS_TO is checked in the goal context. If locked is true, TaggingManager.SECURE_LOCK_LINKS is also checked in in the activity context.
        Specified by:
        addLink in interface TaggingManager
        Parameters:
        activityRef - A reference for the activity to which this link is being created.
        tagCriteriaRef - The tagCriteriaRef to which this link is being created. It must belong to a published parent.
        rationale - The rationale for creating this link.
        rubric - Some rubric value.
        visible - True if this link should be made visible to those with appropriate permissions, false otherwise.
        locked - True if this link should be made locked to those with appropriate permissions, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        The link that has been added, or null on error.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - Exception thrown if current user doesn't have permission to perform this action in the given context.
